name: Gluttony (petroltf, Denis, RustyGears)
description:
This game maked for BatyaGameJam2021 within 48 hours.

--Rules--

1. You have a list of products to buy

 2. You have your friend Bob 

3. Bob eats stuff and he can't help it 

4. Stop Bob before he eats smth and pick up all of the list

 5. Reach the cash desk before time runs out

--Team--

Vladimir Duhanin (https://rustygears.itch.io/) - Programming

Ekaterina Argonskaya (https://rixael.itch.io/) - Art

Stanislav Novikov (https://petroltf.itch.io/, petrol#8847) - Art

Denis Volkov (https://wowden92.itch.io/) - Art

Daniil Ostanin (https://gamover.itch.io/)- Sound
